thread.section_title: LensDirect Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LensDirect | lensdirect.com | 2 of 40
thread.title: yohana Pena

author: yohana Pena
title: yohana Pena
text: I accidently posted the wrong prescription and got an email right away. I was at work and couldnt really find the document i needed. I thought oh great now I have to go another day with no contacts ordered. Luckily the representative was so pleasant and eager to help. She called my doctor and got all my documents within a couple of minutes it was an awesome experience and didn't have that weighing on my mind at work. Thanks !
